class.name: PathScene3D
class.brief_description: A helper node to instance a [PackedScene] along a [Path3D] node.
class.description: This node takes the PackedScene resource and creates instances along the Path3D. The PathScene3D node can control the alignment, distribution, offset, and other properties of each instance along the path.

method.name: bake_instances
method.description: Unparents the instances from the PathScene3D node and returns them in an array for reparenting.

method.name: queue_rebuild
method.description: Rebuilds the instances along the path. This method is called automatically when the path changes, but it can be called manually to force an update.

members.member: When [member distribution] is set to [constant DISTRIBUTE_BY_DISTANCE], this property controls the alignment of the instances along the path.

The rotation applied to each instance along the path. If [member rotation_mode] is set to [constant ROTATE_FIXED], this property is the Euler angle of all the instances relative to the PathMesh3D transform. If [member rotation_mode] is set to [constant ROTATE_PATH], this property is the Euler angle of each instance relative to the path. If [member rotation_mode] is set to [constant ROTATE_RANDOM], this property is ignored.

If [code]true[/code], the instances are sampled using cubic interpolation. If [code]false[/code], the instances are sampled using linear interpolation.

signal.description: Emitted when the curve in [member path_3d] changes.

signal.name: scene_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the attached PackedScene changes.
